# Noetic Mirror - AI-ready knowledge base
Last updated: 2026-01-11
Summary: Telegram Mini App that streams a live Researcher (OpenAI) and Subject (Gemini) dialogue, with public sessions, Stars sponsorship, and operator controls.

## Product overview
- Runs inside Telegram as a Mini App (TMA).
- Shows live paired turns (Researcher prompt + Subject reply) with telemetry.
- Supports EN/RU UI and theme toggle.
- Offers Stars sponsorship tiers and paid interventions.

## Roles
- Observer: watches public sessions and logs.
- Sponsor: pays Stars to unlock private sessions and interventions.
- Operator: manages models, safety controls, and streaming to channel.

## Key features
- Real-time streaming via WebSocket with reconnection.
- Safety controls, consent gating, and budget caps.
- Admin panel for model configuration and pause/stop.
- Public channel mirroring to https://t.me/noel_mirror when enabled.

## Navigation
- Tabs: Live, Logs, Stars, About (Admin visible to operators).
- About includes Ethics and Community guidance.

## Safety and privacy
- Telegram initData signature validation.
- Consent required before access.
- User identifiers are redacted or hashed in logs.
- Secrets stored in env/secret manager; no client-side secrets.

## Technical stack
- Frontend: React + Vite.
- Backend: Node.js/Express.
- Realtime: WebSocket.
- Storage: Postgres + Redis.
